segments.text: The girl looks so hopeful, just waiting for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s standing there with her hand out, like she’s sure her brother will share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I love how excited she seems, even if they’re doing something sneaky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really going for it, balancing on that wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn’t fall and ruin the moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still drying dishes, completely missing the fun happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is getting closer to them, but they don’t seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ll get away with it or if the woman will catch them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl’s face is so full of anticipation, it’s adorable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get their cookies and no one gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR
